snippet.title: Metroid Confrontation 2.2 Trailer
snippet.description:
What started as a small Tech demo of AM2R is now a small, complete game.

Metroid Confrontation 2 has a new map layout, a new boss fight, a more refined and optimized engine, new enemies, achievements, a VERY challenging Hard mode, and more! 

You can find the latest version in the official AM2R Blog:
http://metroid2remake.blogspot.com

Song: Watered Down Hell by Flinx.
http://amp.dascene.net/detail.php?detail=modules&view=2747
